com.google.appengine.api.users.dev
Class LoginCookieUtils

java.lang.Object
  com.google.appengine.api.users.dev.LoginCookieUtils

public final class LoginCookieUtils
extends java.lang.Object

LoginCookieUtils encapsulates the creation, deletion, and parsing of the fake authentication cookie used by the Development Appserver to simulate login.

Nested Class Summary
static class LoginCookieUtils.CookieData
          CookieData encapsulates all of the data contained in the fake authentication cookie.
 
Field Summary
static java.lang.String COOKIE_NAME
          The name of the authentication cookie.
static java.lang.String COOKIE_PATH
          The URL path for the authentication cookie.
 
Method Summary
static Cookie createCookie(java.lang.String email, boolean isAdmin)
          Create a fake authentication Cookie with the specified data.
static java.lang.String encodeEmailAsUserId(java.lang.String email)
           
static LoginCookieUtils.CookieData getCookieData(HttpServletRequest req)
          Parse the fake authentication Cookie.
static void removeCookie(HttpServletRequest req, HttpServletResponse resp)
          Remove the fake authentication Cookie, if present.
